TFTTutorial_Augment_BackRowAS1.name: Swift Strike
TFTTutorial_Augment_BackRowAS1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the back 2 rows gain 20 Attack Speed.

TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowHealth1.name: Bulwark
TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowHealth1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the front 2 rows gain 100 Health.

TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowMana1.name: Splash Zone
TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowMana1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the front 2 rows gain 20 Mana.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemAS2.name: Elite Vanguard
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemAS2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 20 Attack Speed.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemHealth2.name: Cybernetic Mass
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemHealth2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 300 Health.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithoutItemAS2.name: Unhindered
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithoutItemAS2.description: Your champions without items gain 55 Attack Speed.

TFT6_Augment_SalvageBin.name: Salvage Bin
TFT6_Augment_SalvageBin.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

TFT6_Augment_SlowAndSteady.name: March of Progress
TFT6_Augment_SlowAndSteady.description: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

TFT6_Augment_PortableForge.name: Portable Forge
TFT6_Augment_PortableForge.description:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT6_Augment_Recombobulator.name: Recombobulator
TFT6_Augment_Recombobulator.description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

TFT9_Augment_JeweledLotus.name: Jeweled Lotus II
TFT9_Augment_JeweledLotus.description: Your team gains 15% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

TFT7_Augment_LivingForge.name: Living Forge
TFT7_Augment_LivingForge.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 8 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT7_Augment_BirthdayPresents.name: Birthday Present
TFT7_Augment_BirthdayPresents.description: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (min: 1-cost).

TFT6_Augment_GachaAddict.name: Prismatic Ticket
TFT6_Augment_GachaAddict.description: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 50% chance to gain a free reroll.

TFT9_Augment_YoungAndWildAndFree.name: Young and Wild and Free
TFT9_Augment_YoungAndWildAndFree.description: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 2 gold.

TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk2.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFriday.name: Phreaky Friday
TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFriday.description:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk1.name: Cybernetic Bulk I
TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk1.description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health.

TFT9_Augment_CapriciousForge.name: Capricious Forge
TFT9_Augment_CapriciousForge.description:
Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two random Artifacts each round.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk3.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk3.description: Your champions holding an item gain 500 Health.

TFT9_Augment_StarterKit.name: Starter Kit
TFT9_Augment_StarterKit.description:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 4 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink2.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCrafting.name: Latent Forge
TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCrafting.description:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink3.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink3.description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

TFT9_Augment_Formation2.name: Unified Resistance II
TFT9_Augment_Formation2.description: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

TFT9_Augment_TonsOfStats.name: Tons of Stats!
TFT9_Augment_TonsOfStats.description: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

TFT9_Augment_Formation1.name: Unified Resistance I
TFT9_Augment_Formation1.description: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.

TFT9_Augment_CustomerIsAlwaysRight.name: Component Buffet
TFT9_Augment_CustomerIsAlwaysRight.description:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_IronAssets.name: Iron Assets
TFT9_Augment_IronAssets.description:
Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_StarsAreBorn.name: Stars are Born
TFT9_Augment_StarsAreBorn.description: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

TFT9_Augment_MissedConnections.name: Missed Connections
TFT9_Augment_MissedConnections.description: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

TFT9_Augment_RollTheDice.name: Roll The Dice
TFT9_Augment_RollTheDice.description:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

TFT9_Augment_Sleightofhand.name: Sleight of Hand
TFT9_Augment_Sleightofhand.description: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

TFT9_Augment_ACutAbove.name: A Cut Above
TFT9_Augment_ACutAbove.description: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

TFT9_Augment_Idealism.name: Idealism
TFT9_Augment_Idealism.description: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions holding this item deal 11% increased damage.

TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsI.name: Healing Orbs I
TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsI.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 225.

TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsII.name: Healing Orbs II
TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsII.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 450.

TFT9_Augment_GargantuanResolve.name: Gargantuan Resolve
TFT9_Augment_GargantuanResolve.description: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.

TFT9_Augment_GiftsFromTheFallen.name: Gifts from the Fallen
TFT9_Augment_GiftsFromTheFallen.description:
Your team gains 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

Each time an ally dies, gain these stats again.

TFT9_Augment_HedgeFund.name: Hedge Fund
TFT9_Augment_HedgeFund.description:
Gain 20 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT9_Augment_HedgeFundPlus.name: Hedge Fund+
TFT9_Augment_HedgeFundPlus.description:
Gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT9_Augment_Martyr.name: Martyr
TFT9_Augment_Martyr.description: Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their max Health.

TFT9_Augment_LongDistanceRelationship2.name: Long Distance Pals
TFT9_Augment_LongDistanceRelationship2.description: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

TFT9_Augment_GreaterJeweledLotus.name: Jeweled Lotus III
TFT9_Augment_GreaterJeweledLotus.description: Your team gains 40% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

TFT9_Augment_BronzeTicket.name: Silver Ticket
TFT9_Augment_BronzeTicket.description: Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls. Gain 3 gold.

TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollection.name: Buried Treasures I
TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollection.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 2 rounds (including this round).

TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlus.name: Buried Treasures II
TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlus.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 3 rounds (including this round).

TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlusPlus.name: Buried Treasures III
TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlusPlus.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

TFT9_Augment_KnowYourEnemy.name: Know Your Enemy
TFT9_Augment_KnowYourEnemy.description:
Your team deals 10% more damage.

Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

TFT6_Augment_TinyTitans.name: Tiny Titans
TFT6_Augment_TinyTitans.description: Increase your current and max player health by 30.

TFT6_Augment_MetabolicAccelerator.name: Metabolic Accelerator
TFT6_Augment_MetabolicAccelerator.description: Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

TFT9_Augment_Harmacist1.name: Harmacist I
TFT9_Augment_Harmacist1.description:
Your team has 10% Omnivamp and converts 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

TFT9_Augment_Harmacist2.name: Harmacist II
TFT9_Augment_Harmacist2.description:
Your team has 15% Omnivamp and converts 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

TFT9_Augment_Harmacist3.name: Harmacist III
TFT9_Augment_Harmacist3.description:
Your team has 25% Omnivamp and converts 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

TFT6_Augment_PandorasItems.name: Pandora's Items
TFT6_Augment_PandorasItems.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.

TFT9_Augment_PandorasRadiantBox.name: Pandora's Items III
TFT9_Augment_PandorasRadiantBox.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

TFT9_Augment_PandorasItems2.name: Pandora's Items II
TFT9_Augment_PandorasItems2.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 2 random components.

TFT9_Augment_WhatDoesntKillYou.name: What Doesn't Kill You
TFT9_Augment_WhatDoesntKillYou.description:
Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

Losses until next component: ?

TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuilding.name: Team Building
TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuilding.description:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 7 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT9_Augment_RiskyMoves.name: Risky Moves
TFT9_Augment_RiskyMoves.description: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 33 gold.

TFT9_Augment_NotToday.name: Not Today
TFT9_Augment_NotToday.description: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

TFT6_Augment_OneTwoFive.name: One, Two, Five!
TFT6_Augment_OneTwoFive.description: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp.name: Pumping Up I
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp.description: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.50% more. (current Attack Speed: ?%)

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp2.name: Pumping Up II
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp2.description: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more. (current Attack Speed: ?%)

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp3.name: Pumping Up III
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp3.description: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more. (current Attack Speed: ?%)

TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitan.name: Tiniest Titan
TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitan.description: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

TFT6_Augment_TradeSector.name: Trade Sector
TFT6_Augment_TradeSector.description: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 1 gold.

TFT6_Augment_MaxLevel10.name: Level Up!
TFT6_Augment_MaxLevel10.description: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 8 immediately.

TFT9_Augment_YouHaveMySword.name: You Have My Sword
TFT9_Augment_YouHaveMySword.description: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

TFT9_Augment_YouHaveMyBow.name: You Have My Bow
TFT9_Augment_YouHaveMyBow.description: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

TFT9_Augment_OldMansWalkingStick.name: Magic Wand
TFT9_Augment_OldMansWalkingStick.description: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

TFT9_Augment_EscortQuest.name: Escort Quest
TFT9_Augment_EscortQuest.description: Gain a Training Dummy. You gain 3 gold every time it survives player combat.

TFT9_Augment_ThreesACrowd.name: Three's a Crowd
TFT9_Augment_ThreesACrowd.description: Your team gains 66 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

TFT9_Augment_TwoHealthy.name: Two Healthy
TFT9_Augment_TwoHealthy.description: Your team gains 90 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

TFT9_Augment_RedBuff.name: Blistering Strikes
TFT9_Augment_RedBuff.description: Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

TFT9_Augment_LearningFromExperience2.name: Patient Study
TFT9_Augment_LearningFromExperience2.description: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

TFT6_Augment_RadiantRelics.name: Radiant Relics
TFT6_Augment_RadiantRelics.description:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

TFT9_Augment_CombatCaster.name: Combat Caster
TFT9_Augment_CombatCaster.description: Your team gains 80-160 Shield for 4 seconds after casting their Ability. The Shield amount scales with round of the game.

TFT9_Augment_BlindingSpeed.name: Blinding Speed
TFT9_Augment_BlindingSpeed.description:
Gain a Red Buff, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!

TFT9_Augment_ImpenetrableBulwark.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
TFT9_Augment_ImpenetrableBulwark.description:
Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Tanks or Attack Tanks!

TFT9_Augment_UnleashedArcana.name: Unleashed Arcana
TFT9_Augment_UnleashedArcana.description:
Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries or Magic Casters!

TFT9_Augment_OverwhelmingForce.name: Overwhelming Force
TFT9_Augment_OverwhelmingForce.description:
Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries or Attack Fighters!

TFT7_Augment_LategameSpecialist.name: Lategame Specialist
TFT7_Augment_LategameSpecialist.description: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

TFT6_Augment_TheGoldenEgg.name: The Golden Egg
TFT6_Augment_TheGoldenEgg.description: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

TFT9_Augment_HighEndSector.name: Shopping Spree
TFT9_Augment_HighEndSector.description: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds. Gain 4 gold.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook1.name: Caretaker's Ally
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook1.description: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook2.name: Caretaker's Favor
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook2.description:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook3.name: Caretaker's Chosen
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook3.description:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayPlus.name: Phreaky Friday +
TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayPlus.description:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

TFT9_Augment_HedgeFundPlusPlus.name: Hedge Fund++
TFT9_Augment_HedgeFundPlusPlus.description:
Gain 40 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT8_Augment_SalvageBinPlus.name: Salvage Bin+
TFT8_Augment_SalvageBinPlus.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

TFT10_Augment_CrashTestDummies.name: Crash Test Dummies
TFT10_Augment_CrashTestDummies.description: Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 1 seconds.

TFT10_Augment_LuckyStreak.name: Lucky Streak
TFT10_Augment_LuckyStreak.description:
Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

Gambler's Blade helps you gain gold.

TFT7_Augment_BestFriends1.name: Best Friends I
TFT7_Augment_BestFriends1.description: Units isolated in pairs gain 11% Attack Speed and 12 Armor at the start of combat.

TFT7_Augment_BestFriends2.name: Best Friends II
TFT7_Augment_BestFriends2.description: Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.

TFT10_Augment_LearningToSpell.name: Learning to Spell
TFT10_Augment_LearningToSpell.description: Your team gains 18 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.

TFT6_Augment_Keepers1.name: Keepers I
TFT6_Augment_Keepers1.description: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 175 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

TFT10_Augment_HeavyHitters.name: Heavy Hitters
TFT10_Augment_HeavyHitters.description: Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1.00% of their max Health.

TFT6_Augment_Keepers2.name: Keepers II
TFT6_Augment_Keepers2.description: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 260 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

TFT10_Augment_BigGains.name: Big Gains
TFT10_Augment_BigGains.description: Your units gains 100 bonus Health, and permanently gains 10 Health every 2 takedowns.

TFT10_Augment_InspiringEpitaph.name: Inspiring Epitaph
TFT10_Augment_InspiringEpitaph.description: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 20% max Health Shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.

TFT6_Augment_ForceOfNature.name: New Recruit
TFT6_Augment_ForceOfNature.description: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.

TFT10_Augment_ShockTreatment.name: Shock Treatment
TFT10_Augment_ShockTreatment.description: Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Statikk Shivs' chain lightning effects deal 40-125% more damage (based on stage level).

TFT10_Augment_LowInterestRates.name: Low Interest Rates
TFT10_Augment_LowInterestRates.description:
Your max interest is capped at 4 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT10_Augment_SwitchingGears.name: Switching Gears
TFT10_Augment_SwitchingGears.description: Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.

TFT10_Augment_HeroicGrabBag.name: Heroic Grab Bag
TFT10_Augment_HeroicGrabBag.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 6 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT10_Augment_FullyAdapted.name: Fully Adapted
TFT10_Augment_FullyAdapted.description: Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects, regardless of position.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_FinalAscension.name: Final Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_FinalAscension.description: Your team deals 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 45% more damage.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_PartialAscension.name: Partial Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_PartialAscension.description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_Ascension.name: Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_Ascension.description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

TFT6_Augment_ClearMind.name: Clear Mind
TFT6_Augment_ClearMind.description: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

TFT7_Augment_ClutteredMind.name: Cluttered Mind
TFT7_Augment_ClutteredMind.description: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

TFT10_Augment_GoingLong.name: Going Long
TFT10_Augment_GoingLong.description:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 10 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT10_Augment_Scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
TFT10_Augment_Scapegoat.description: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomethingSilver.name: Good For Something I
TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomethingSilver.description: Champions that aren't holding items have a 40% to drop 1 gold on death.

TFT10_Augment_CrownGuarded.name: Crown Guarded
TFT10_Augment_CrownGuarded.description: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 100% stronger.

TFT10_Augment_SilverVeil.name: Silver Veil
TFT10_Augment_SilverVeil.description: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

TFT10_Augment_HelpIsOnTheWay.name: Help Is On The Way
TFT10_Augment_HelpIsOnTheWay.description: After 8 player combats, choose 1 of 4 Support items.

TFT10_Augment_Stimpack.name: Stimpack
TFT10_Augment_Stimpack.description:
Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

(Health lost this game: ?)

TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport2.name: Stationary Support II
TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport2.description: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

TFT7_Augment_LuckyGloves.name: Lucky Gloves
TFT7_Augment_LuckyGloves.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

TFT7_Augment_LuckyGlovesPlus.name: Lucky Gloves+
TFT7_Augment_LuckyGlovesPlus.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport3.name: Stationary Support III
TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport3.description: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitanPlus.name: Tiniest Titan+
TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitanPlus.description:
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

TFT9_Augment_BalancedBudget2.name: Balanced Budget
TFT9_Augment_BalancedBudget2.description: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp2.name: Teaming Up II
TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp2.description: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp1.name: Teaming Up I
TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp1.description: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport1.name: Stationary Support I
TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport1.description: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

TFT9_Augment_BigGrabBag.name: Big Grab Bag
TFT9_Augment_BigGrabBag.description:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

TFT10_Augment_LittleBuddies.name: Little Buddies
TFT10_Augment_LittleBuddies.description: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 65 Health and 9% Attack Speed  for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

TFT11_Augment_AltruistCrest.name: Altruist Crest
TFT11_Augment_AltruistCrest.description: Gain an Altruist Emblem and a Riven.

TFT11_Augment_AltruistCrown.name: Altruist Crown
TFT11_Augment_AltruistCrown.description: Gain an Altruist Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Riven.

TFT11_Augment_ArcanistCrest.name: Arcanist Crest
TFT11_Augment_ArcanistCrest.description: Gain an Arcanist Emblem and a Zoe.

TFT11_Augment_ArcanistCrown.name: Arcanist Crown
TFT11_Augment_ArcanistCrown.description: Gain an Arcanist Emblem, a Statikk Shiv, and a Zoe.

TFT11_Augment_BehemothCrest.name: Behemoth Crest
TFT11_Augment_BehemothCrest.description: Gain a Behemoth Emblem, a Shen, and a Thresh.

TFT11_Augment_BehemothCrown.name: Behemoth Crown
TFT11_Augment_BehemothCrown.description: Gain a Behemoth Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, a Yorick, and a Thresh.

TFT11_Augment_BrawlerCrest.name: Bruiser Crest
TFT11_Augment_BrawlerCrest.description: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Tahm Kench.

TFT11_Augment_BrawlerCrown.name: Bruiser Crown
TFT11_Augment_BrawlerCrown.description: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and an Aatrox.

TFT11_Augment_DragonlordCrest.name: Dragonlord Crest
TFT11_Augment_DragonlordCrest.description: Gain a Dragonlord Emblem, a Janna, and a Diana.

TFT11_Augment_DragonlordCrown.name: Dragonlord Crown
TFT11_Augment_DragonlordCrown.description: Gain a Dragonlord Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Janna, and a Diana.

TFT11_Augment_DryadCrest.name: Dryad Crest
TFT11_Augment_DryadCrest.description: Gain a Dryad Emblem and a Gnar.

TFT11_Augment_DryadCrown.name: Dryad Crown
TFT11_Augment_DryadCrown.description: Gain a Dryad Emblem, a Titans Resolve, and a Gnar.

TFT11_Augment_DuelistCrest.name: Duelist Crest
TFT11_Augment_DuelistCrest.description: Gain a Duelist Emblem and a Qiyana.

TFT11_Augment_DuelistCrown.name: Duelist Crown
TFT11_Augment_DuelistCrown.description: Gain a Duelist Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Qiyana.

TFT11_Augment_FatedCrest.name: Fated Crest
TFT11_Augment_FatedCrest.description: Gain a Fated Emblem and a Kindred.

TFT11_Augment_FatedCrown.name: Fated Crown
TFT11_Augment_FatedCrown.description: Gain a Fated Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Kindred.

TFT11_Augment_FortuneCrown.name: Fortune Crown
TFT11_Augment_FortuneCrown.description: Gain a Fortune Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Tristana.

TFT11_Augment_GhostlyCrest.name: Ghostly Crest
TFT11_Augment_GhostlyCrest.description: Gain a Ghostly Emblem and a Shen.

TFT11_Augment_GhostlyCrown.name: Ghostly Crown
TFT11_Augment_GhostlyCrown.description: Gain a Ghostly Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and an Illaoi.

TFT11_Augment_HeavenlyCrown.name: Heavenly Crown
TFT11_Augment_HeavenlyCrown.description: Gain a Heavenly Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Neeko.

TFT11_Augment_InkshadowCrown.name: Inkshadow Crown
TFT11_Augment_InkshadowCrown.description: Gain an Inkshadow Emblem, an Evenshroud, and a Senna.

TFT11_Augment_InvokerCrest.name: Invoker Crest
TFT11_Augment_InvokerCrest.description: Gain an Invoker Emblem and a Janna.

TFT11_Augment_InvokerCrown.name: Invoker Crown
TFT11_Augment_InvokerCrown.description: Gain an Invoker Emblem, a Rabadon's Deathcap, and a Janna.

TFT11_Augment_MythicCrest.name: Mythic Crest
TFT11_Augment_MythicCrest.description: Gain a Mythic Emblem and a Neeko.

TFT11_Augment_MythicCrown.name: Mythic Crown
TFT11_Augment_MythicCrown.description: Gain a Mythic Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Neeko.

TFT11_Augment_PorcelainCrest.name: Porcelain Crest
TFT11_Augment_PorcelainCrest.description: Gain a Porcelain Emblem and an Amumu.

TFT11_Augment_PorcelainCrown.name: Porcelain Crown
TFT11_Augment_PorcelainCrown.description: Gain a Porcelain Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and an Amumu.

TFT11_Augment_ReaperCrown.name: Reaper Crown
TFT11_Augment_ReaperCrown.description: Gain a Reaper Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Kindred.

TFT11_Augment_SageCrest.name: Sage Crest
TFT11_Augment_SageCrest.description: Gain a Sage Emblem, a Zyra, and a Diana.

TFT11_Augment_SageCrown.name: Sage Crown
TFT11_Augment_SageCrown.description: Gain a Sage Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, a Zyra, and a Diana.

TFT11_Augment_SniperCrest.name: Sniper Crest
TFT11_Augment_SniperCrest.description: Gain a Sniper Emblem and an Aphelios.

TFT11_Augment_SniperCrown.name: Sniper Crown
TFT11_Augment_SniperCrown.description: Gain a Sniper Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and an Aphelios.

TFT11_Augment_StoryweaverCrest.name: Storyweaver Crest
TFT11_Augment_StoryweaverCrest.description: Gain a Storyweaver Emblem and a Garen.

TFT11_Augment_StoryweaverCrown.name: Storyweaver Crown
TFT11_Augment_StoryweaverCrown.description: Gain a Storyweaver Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Garen.

TFT11_Augment_UmbralCrown.name: Umbral Crown
TFT11_Augment_UmbralCrown.description: Gain an Umbral Emblem, a Redemption, and a Yorick.

TFT11_Augment_WardenCrest.name: Warden Crest
TFT11_Augment_WardenCrest.description: Gain a Warden Emblem, a Jax, and an Amumu.

TFT11_Augment_WardenCrown.name: Warden Crown
TFT11_Augment_WardenCrown.description: Gain a Warden Emblem, a Redemption and an Amumu.

TFT11_Augment_Buildabud.name: Build a Bud!
TFT11_Augment_Buildabud.description: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion and 8 gold.

TFT11_Augment_SharingIsCaring.name: Sharing Is Caring
TFT11_Augment_SharingIsCaring.description: Combat start: You gain 1 gold and your opponent gains 1 gold.

TFT11_Augment_Reinfourcement.name: ReinFOURcement
TFT11_Augment_Reinfourcement.description: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Get 12 gold.

TFT11_Augment_Epoch.name: Epoch
TFT11_Augment_Epoch.description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 6 XP and 2 free rerolls.

TFT11_Augment_TinyButDeadly.name: Tiny, but Deadly
TFT11_Augment_TinyButDeadly.description: Your team is 50% smaller, but moves and attacks 30% faster.

TFT11_Augment_OverEncumbered.name: Over Encumbered
TFT11_Augment_OverEncumbered.description: For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slot. After, get 3 item components.

TFT11_Augment_FineVintage.name: Fine Vintage
TFT11_Augment_FineVintage.description: Completed items left on your bench for 4 rounds transform into Support Anvils.

TFT11_Augment_BloodBank.name: Lunch Money
TFT11_Augment_BloodBank.description:
Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.
(Current: ?)

TFT11_Augment_ScoreboardScrapper.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
TFT11_Augment_ScoreboardScrapper.description: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

TFT11_Augment_Accomplice.name: Accomplice
TFT11_Augment_Accomplice.description: Get a Support Thief's Gloves and 2 gold.

TFT11_Augment_Slammin.name: Slammin'
TFT11_Augment_Slammin.description: Gain 1 random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

TFT11_Augment_Calltochaos.name: Call to Chaos
TFT11_Augment_Calltochaos.description:
Gain a powerful and random reward.

Reward: ?

TFT11_Augment_Prizefighter.name: Prizefighter
TFT11_Augment_Prizefighter.description: Gain 1 item component(s). Every 3 wins gives you an item component.

TFT11_Augment_DynamicDuo.name: Dynamic Duo
TFT11_Augment_DynamicDuo.description: Get a random 5-cost champion and a random champion that shares a trait with them. Get 20 gold.

TFT11_Augment_Dragonlord.name: Enter the Dragon
TFT11_Augment_Dragonlord.description: After the dragon strikes, Dragonlords deal 20% bonus true damage. Gain a Janna and Diana.

TFT11_Augment_Ghostly.name: Haunted House
TFT11_Augment_Ghostly.description: Enemies that die while haunted by Ghostly pass 2 extra spectre to a nearby enemy. Gain an Aatrox and a Shen.

TFT11_Augment_Heavenly.name: Divine Rolls
TFT11_Augment_Heavenly.description: At the start of every stage, including this one, gain 4 free rerolls + 1 for each of your Heavenly champions. Rerolls last this turn only. Gain a Kha'Zix and a Malphite.

TFT11_Augment_TwoforOne.name: Two for One
TFT11_Augment_TwoforOne.description: Each round, get a copy of the first champion you buy that costs 3 or less.

TFT11_Augment_RadiantRefactor.name: Radiant Refactor
TFT11_Augment_RadiantRefactor.description:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvils.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

TFT11_Augment_Storyweaver.name: Call to Adventure
TFT11_Augment_Storyweaver.description: Every 2 takedowns, Storyweaver Kayle permanently gains 3 Ability Power and 18 Health. Gain a Garen and Riven.

TFT11_Augment_Slammin_Plus.name: Slammin'+
TFT11_Augment_Slammin_Plus.description: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

TFT11_Augment_Sniper.name: Long Shot
TFT11_Augment_Sniper.description: Snipers gain 15% Attack Speed. Gain a Caitlyn and a Kog'Maw. After Snipers have attacked a total distance of 1200 hexes, gain a Sniper's Focus. (Current: ?)

TFT11_Augment_Sage.name: The Road Less Traveled
TFT11_Augment_Sage.description: Gain 1 XP at the start of each combat. Each unique Sage that starts in the middle two rows grants 1 more. Gain a Zyra.

TFT11_Augment_Porcelain.name: Boiling Point
TFT11_Augment_Porcelain.description: Porcelains' attacks grant 3 bonus Mana. While boiling, their attacks also Burn and Wound. Gain a Lux and an Amumu.

TFT11_Augment_Invoker.name: Mana Shield
TFT11_Augment_Invoker.description: Whenever an Invoker casts, grant the lowest Health ally Shield equal to 200% of Mana spent. Gain a Janna.

TFT11_Augment_Reaper.name: Grim Harvest
TFT11_Augment_Reaper.description: Your Reapers gain 7% Critical Strike Chance and 5% Omnivamp. They gain this bonus again every time they get a takedown. Gain a Kindred and Yone.

TFT11_Augment_Exalted.name: Venerable Piggy Bank
TFT11_Augment_Exalted.description:
Gain 2 Exalted Champions. Your Exalted Soul Core gains 2 gold instead of XP. If you lose combat, it gains 2 bonus gold.

If there no 1 or 2-cost Exalted champions, get one 3-cost instead.

TFT11_Augment_Mythic.name: It's Going to be Epic
TFT11_Augment_Mythic.description: Every time a unique Mythic champion becomes Epic, gain 2 player health and 3 gold. Gain a Cho'Gath and Kog'Maw.

TFT11_Augment_KobukoCarry.name: Lucky Paws
TFT11_Augment_KobukoCarry.description: Gain a 2-star Kobuko. Your strongest Kobuko's Ability deals 225% damage. If Kobuko kills an enemy, they have a 100% chance to drop 1 gold.

TFT11_Augment_Trickshot.name: Lucky Ricochet
TFT11_Augment_Trickshot.description: Trickshots bounce 1 extra time for 40% of original damage. Gain a Sivir and Teemo.

TFT11_Augment_Warden.name: Spirit Guardians
TFT11_Augment_Warden.description: Wardens' start of combat damage reduction is increased by 12%. 20% of damage dealt to non-Wardens is instead distributed across your Wardens. Get a Gnar and Amumu.

TFT11_Augment_GarenCarry.name: Storied Champion
TFT11_Augment_GarenCarry.description: Gain a 2-star Garen. Your strongest Garen's Ability now grants stacking max Health instead of Shield. If he has more max Health than his target, his Ability deals 44% bonus true damage.

TFT11_Augment_Umbral.name: Wrath of the Moon
TFT11_Augment_Umbral.description: Umbral champions deal 3% more damage every second they continue attacking an enemy. Resets when they swap targets. Gain a Darius and a Yorick.

TFT11_Augment_ShenCarry.name: Ethereal Blades
TFT11_Augment_ShenCarry.description: Gain a Shen. Your strongest Shen has +3 Range and his Ability deals 85% increased damage.

TFT11_Augment_YorickCarry.name: Midnight Siphon
TFT11_Augment_YorickCarry.description: Gain a Yorick. Your strongest Yorick gains 25% max Health and additionally deals 20% of his max Health with his Ability.

TFT11_Augment_Behemoth.name: Raid Boss
TFT11_Augment_Behemoth.description: Combat start: Your strongest Behemoth gains 20% Health. When other Behemoths die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Malphite and a Yorick.

TFT11_Augment_Dryad.name: Mulched
TFT11_Augment_Dryad.description: Every round, gain 2 Dryad stacks. Dryads deal 7% additional damage. Gain a Rek'Sai and a Gnar.

TFT11_Augment_Bruiser.name: Well Fed
TFT11_Augment_Bruiser.description: Bruisers heal 1% of their max Health every 1 second. Gain a Kobuko and a Aatrox.

TFT11_Augment_Duelist.name: Extended Duel
TFT11_Augment_Duelist.description: Your Duelists start combat with 2 stacks. At max stacks, they gain 10% Omnivamp. Gain a Darius and a Yasuo.

TFT11_Augment_EpochPlus.name: Epoch+
TFT11_Augment_EpochPlus.description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls.

TFT11_Augment_NeekoCarry.name: Drop Blossom!
TFT11_Augment_NeekoCarry.description: Gain a Neeko. Your strongest Neeko's Ability heals 34% more, and slams for 34% increased damage. Each cast increases the Ability radius by 1.

TFT11_Augment_TooMuchCandy.name: Too Much Candy
TFT11_Augment_TooMuchCandy.description: Your rerolls cost null gold. Every 6 rerolls, the cost goes up by 1 gold. At the start of each stage your reroll cost is reset to null.

TFT11_Augment_ShenCarryPlus.name: Ethereal Blades+
TFT11_Augment_ShenCarryPlus.description: Gain a 2-star Shen. Your strongest Shen has +3 Range and his Ability does 85% increased damage.

TFT11_Augment_NeekoCarryPlus.name: Drop Blossom!+
TFT11_Augment_NeekoCarryPlus.description: Gain a 2-star Neeko. Your strongest Neeko's Ability heals 34% more, and slams for 34% more damage. Each cast increases the Ability radius by 1.

TFT11_Augment_YorickCarryPlus.name: Midnight Siphon+
TFT11_Augment_YorickCarryPlus.description: Gain a 2-star Yorick. Your strongest Yorick gains 25% max Health and additionally deals 20% of his max Health with his Ability.

TFT11_Augment_Arcanist.name: Mind Over Matter
TFT11_Augment_Arcanist.description: Arcanists grant 250% of their combined Ability Power as bonus Health to your Training Dummies. Get a Zoe and a Training Dummy.

TFT9_Augment_BalancedBudgetPlus.name: Balanced Budget+
TFT9_Augment_BalancedBudgetPlus.description: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 9 gold.

TFT6_Augment_Distancing.name: Exiles I
TFT6_Augment_Distancing.description: Your units that start combat with no adjacent allies gain a 25% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

TFT6_Augment_Featherweights1.name: Featherweights I
TFT6_Augment_Featherweights1.description: Your Tier 1 and 2 champions gain 15% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

TFT6_Augment_TriForce1.name: Tri Force I
TFT6_Augment_TriForce1.description: Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

TFT6_Augment_Traitless2.name: Built Different II
TFT6_Augment_Traitless2.description: Your units with no Traits active gain 240-530 Health and 45-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

TFT6_Augment_Diversify2.name: Stand United II
TFT6_Augment_Diversify2.description: Your units gain 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

TFT9_Augment_WanderingTrainer.name: Wandering Trainer II
TFT9_Augment_WanderingTrainer.description: Gain 6 gold and a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems.

TFT_Augment_BranchingOut.name: Branching Out
TFT_Augment_BranchingOut.description:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

TFT11_Augment_WanderingTrainerGold.name: Wandering Trainer I
TFT11_Augment_WanderingTrainerGold.description: Gain 1 gold and a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems.

TFT11_Augment_DragonSpirit.name: Dragon's Spirit
TFT11_Augment_DragonSpirit.description: Gain a Dragon's Claw. Every time you heal 7000 Health with Dragon's Claws, gain an item component, up to 4. (Current: ?)

TFT11_Augment_RainingGold.name: Raining Gold
TFT11_Augment_RainingGold.description: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

TFT11_Augment_RainingGoldPlus.name: Raining Gold+
TFT11_Augment_RainingGoldPlus.description: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

TFT_Augment_AvengeTheFallen.name: Avenge The Fallen
TFT_Augment_AvengeTheFallen.description: After 3 allies die, your team gains 15% Attack Damage, 15 Ability Power, 15 Armor, and 15 Magic Resist.

TFT_Augment_VerticallyInclined.name: Vertically Inclined
TFT_Augment_VerticallyInclined.description:
Your team deals 8% more damage.

Deal 16% more damage instead if you have less active non-unique traits than your opponent.

TFT_Augment_TraitTracker.name: Trait Tracker
TFT_Augment_TraitTracker.description: The first time you activate 7 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 5 random emblems.

TFT_Augment_AnUpgradedJourney.name: An Upgraded Adventure
TFT_Augment_AnUpgradedJourney.description: After upgrading 4 champions to 3-star, gain a magnificent reward. Gain 4 1-cost champions.

TFT_Augment_OopsAllRageblades.name: Anger Issues
TFT_Augment_OopsAllRageblades.description: All your current and future completed items transform into Guinsoo's Rageblades that grant 25 Armor and Magic Resist. Every 2 Rageblade stacks grant 1% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_PlaceboPlus.name: Placebo
TFT_Augment_PlaceboPlus.description: Gain 15 gold. Your team gains 1.00% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_DuoQueue.name: Duo Queue
TFT_Augment_DuoQueue.description: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

TFT_Augment_FortuneFavorsTheBold.name: Fortune Favors the Bold
TFT_Augment_FortuneFavorsTheBold.description: Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer your loss streak, the bigger the payout.

TFT_Augment_FindYourCenter.name: Find Your Center
TFT_Augment_FindYourCenter.description: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the board gains 15% damage and 10% max Health.

TFT_Augment_ImTheCarryNow.name: I'm The Carry Now
TFT_Augment_ImTheCarryNow.description: Get a Sentinel with tailored offensive items. It gets stronger at the start of each Stage.

TFT11_Augment_AtWhatCost.name: At What Cost
TFT11_Augment_AtWhatCost.description: Immediately go to level 6 and gain null XP. You don't get to choose your future augments.

TFT7_Augment_PandorasBench.name: Pandora's Bench
TFT7_Augment_PandorasBench.description: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

TFT11_Augment_GoldenRemover.name: The Golden Remover
TFT11_Augment_GoldenRemover.description:
Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.

TFT_Augment_ExplosiveGrowth.name: Explosive Growth
TFT_Augment_ExplosiveGrowth.description: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 8 XP.

TFT_Augment_ExplosiveGrowthPlus.name: Explosive Growth+
TFT_Augment_ExplosiveGrowthPlus.description: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 10 XP.

TFT_Augment_ClockworkAccelerator.name: Clockwork Accelerator
TFT_Augment_ClockworkAccelerator.description: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed every 4 seconds in combat.

TFT_Augment_RanduinsImmovableObject.name: Immovable Object
TFT_Augment_RanduinsImmovableObject.description: Gain a Randuin's Omen. Its range is increased by 1 hex and its effect is increased by 69%.

TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitPrismatic.name: Worth the Wait II
TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitPrismatic.description:
Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy at the start of each round for the next 8 rounds.

Champion: ?

TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitGold.name: Worth the Wait
TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitGold.description:
Gain a random 1-cost champion. After 4 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: ?

TFT9_Augment_WhatTheForge.name: What the Forge
TFT9_Augment_WhatTheForge.description: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 110 Health per equipped Artifact.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar.name: Spoils of War I
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar.description: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar2.name: Spoils of War II
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar2.description: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar3.name: Spoils of War III
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar3.description: Enemies have a 40% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT7_Augment_AFK.name: AFK
TFT7_Augment_AFK.description: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.

TFT_Augment_CalledShot.name: Called Shot
TFT_Augment_CalledShot.description: Set your win streak to +4. Gain 2 gold.

TFT_Augment_BeggarsCanBeChoosers.name: Beggars Can Be Choosers
TFT_Augment_BeggarsCanBeChoosers.description: You get +3 Augment rerolls for all other augment choices. Gain 4 gold.

TFT_Augment_CategoryFive.name: Category Five
TFT_Augment_CategoryFive.description: Gain a Runaan's Hurricane. Your Runaan's Hurricanes shoot 1 extra bolts, each dealing NaN% of the original damage.

TFT9_Augment_AllThatShimmers.name: All That Shimmers
TFT9_Augment_AllThatShimmers.description:
Open an Armory and choose a gold-generating Artifact items and gain a Magnetic Remover. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT_Augment_Spellblades.name: Spellblades
TFT_Augment_Spellblades.description: Whenever one of your champion casts, their next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 175% of their Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_Flexible.name: Flexible
TFT_Augment_Flexible.description: Gain 1 random emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random emblem. Your team gains 25 Health for each emblem they are holding.

TFT_Augment_AllThatShimmersPlus.name: All That Shimmers+
TFT_Augment_AllThatShimmersPlus.description:
Open an Armory and choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover and 4 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT_Augment_SubscriptionService.name: Subscription Service
TFT_Augment_SubscriptionService.description: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 6 gold.

TFT_Augment_RestartMission.name: Restart Mission
TFT_Augment_RestartMission.description: Sell all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs,  2 2-star 2-costs, and a 2-star 1-cost champion.

TFT_Augment_ThornPlatedArmor.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
TFT_Augment_ThornPlatedArmor.description: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 5-100% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 50% of the damage dealt.

TFT_Augment_UnleashTheBeast.name: Unleash The Beast
TFT_Augment_UnleashTheBeast.description: Gain a Sterak's Gage. When its effect triggers, the holder gains 30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat and immunity to crowd control for 10 seconds.

TFT_Augment_PerfectLoss.name: Precise Planning
TFT_Augment_PerfectLoss.description: When you win or lose combat by 3 or fewer units, gain 2 gold next round.

TFT_Augment_Placebo.name: Placebo
TFT_Augment_Placebo.description: Gain 8 gold. Your team gains 1.00% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_UpwardMobility.name: Upward Mobility
TFT_Augment_UpwardMobility.description: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 3 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

TFT_Augment_DoubleDown.name: Double Down
TFT_Augment_DoubleDown.description: After each player combat, gain gold equal to the length of your win or loss streak (max 4 gold).

TFT_Augment_HeadStart.name: Head Start
TFT_Augment_HeadStart.description: Gain 3 random 2-star 1 cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

TFT_Augment_PatienceIsAVirtue.name: Patience is a Virtue
TFT_Augment_PatienceIsAVirtue.description: If you did not buy a champion last round, gain 2 free rerolls.

TFT_Augment_DualPurpose.name: Dual Purpose
TFT_Augment_DualPurpose.description: The first time you buy XP each round, gain 2 gold. Whenever you buy XP, reroll your Shop.

TFT_Augment_ItemLadder.name: Item Ladder
TFT_Augment_ItemLadder.description: Gain a temporary item that unequips and transforms at the start of each round. The item quality increases each Stage.

TFT_Augment_DarkAlleyDealings.name: Dark Alley Dealings
TFT_Augment_DarkAlleyDealings.description: Gain a Suspicious Trenchcoat. After 5 player combats, gain a Trickster's Glass.

TFT_Augment_ShimmerscaleEssence.name: Shimmerscale Essence
TFT_Augment_ShimmerscaleEssence.description:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

TFT_Augment_HighVoltage.name: High Voltage
TFT_Augment_HighVoltage.description: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 25% more damage.

TFT_Augment_AssassinsToolbox.name: Assassin's Toolbox
TFT_Augment_AssassinsToolbox.description: Gain a Gold Collector. In 3 rounds, gain a Prowler's Claw.

TFT_Augment_Pilfer.name: Pilfer
TFT_Augment_Pilfer.description: Gain 5 gold. Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

TFT_Augment_MarksmansToolbox.name: Marksman's Toolbox
TFT_Augment_MarksmansToolbox.description: Gain a Sniper's Focus. in 3 rounds, gain a Fishbones.

TFT_Augment_SupportSentinel.name: Support Golem I
TFT_Augment_SupportSentinel.description: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

TFT_Augment_OnTheHouse.name: On The House
TFT_Augment_OnTheHouse.description: Whenever you star up a champion, gain 1 gold. Gain 4 gold now.

TFT_Augment_SupportSentinel2.name: Support Golem II
TFT_Augment_SupportSentinel2.description: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

TFT_Augment_ReinforcedRejuvenation1.name: Row Rejuvenation I
TFT_Augment_ReinforcedRejuvenation1.description: Your team has 7% Omnivamp, increased by 1.00% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

TFT_Augment_ReinforcedRejuvenation2.name: Row Rejuvenation II
TFT_Augment_ReinforcedRejuvenation2.description: Your team has 9% Omnivamp, increased by 1% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

TFT_Augment_DawnbringersBlessing1.name: Combat Bandages I
TFT_Augment_DawnbringersBlessing1.description: The first time each ally unit falls below 50% health, they restore 150-375 health (based on stage) over 2 seconds.

TFT_Augment_DawnbringersBlessing2.name: Combat Bandages II
TFT_Augment_DawnbringersBlessing2.description: The first time each ally unit falls below 50% health, they restore 250-550 health (based on stage) over 2 seconds.

TFT_Augment_BlossomingLotus1.name: Blossoming Lotus I
TFT_Augment_BlossomingLotus1.description: Your team's Abilities can critically strike. Every 3 seconds, your team gains 5% Critical Strike Chance.

TFT_Augment_HardCommit.name: Hard Commit
TFT_Augment_HardCommit.description: Gain a random emblem. Now and after each Carousel, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage + 1 (max 5).

TFT_Augment_BlossomingLotus2.name: Blossoming Lotus II
TFT_Augment_BlossomingLotus2.description: Your team's Abilities can critically strike. Every 3 seconds, your team gains 10% Critical Strike Chance.

TFT_Augment_GiantAndMighty.name: Giant and Mighty
TFT_Augment_GiantAndMighty.description: Your team gets larger, gaining 325 Health and +5% max Health.

TFT_Augment_InvestedPlus.name: Invested+
TFT_Augment_InvestedPlus.description: Gain 26 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

TFT_Augment_InvestedPlusPlus.name: Invested++
TFT_Augment_InvestedPlusPlus.description: Gain 36 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

TFT_Augment_FinalResistance.name: Final Resistance
TFT_Augment_FinalResistance.description:
Each time an allied champion dies, 30% Shred and Sunder the nearest 4 enemies for 6 seconds.

Shred: reduces Magic Resist, Sunder: reduces Armor

TFT_Augment_SpellcastersToolbox.name: Spellcaster's Toolbox
TFT_Augment_SpellcastersToolbox.description: Gain a Manazane. In 3 rounds, gain a Zhonya's Paradox.

TFT_Augment_Mentorship1.name: Mentorship I
TFT_Augment_Mentorship1.description: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 11% Attack Speed and 150 Health.

TFT_Augment_Mentorship2.name: Mentorship II
TFT_Augment_Mentorship2.description: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 18% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

TFT_Augment_ItemCollector1.name: Item Collector I
TFT_Augment_ItemCollector1.description: Your team gains 20 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 10 Health, 1.00 Attack Damage, and 1 Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_ItemCollector2.name: Item Collector II
TFT_Augment_ItemCollector2.description: Your team gains 40 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 15 Health, 1 Attack Damage, and 1 Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_TwoTanky.name: Two Tanky
TFT_Augment_TwoTanky.description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 550 Health. When one copy dies, the other gains a 40% max health Shield for 6 seconds. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

TFT_Augment_Replication.name: Replication
TFT_Augment_Replication.description: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

TFT12_Augment_MageCrest.name: Mage Crest
TFT12_Augment_MageCrest.description: Gain a Mage Emblem and a Galio.

TFT12_Augment_MageCrown.name: Mage Crown
TFT12_Augment_MageCrown.description: Gain a Mage Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Galio.

TFT12_Augment_ArcanaCrest.name: Arcana Crest
TFT12_Augment_ArcanaCrest.description: Gain an Arcana Emblem, an Ahri, and a Hecarim.

TFT12_Augment_ArcanaCrown.name: Arcana Crown
TFT12_Augment_ArcanaCrown.description: Gain an Arcana Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, an Ahri, and a Hecarim.

TFT12_Augment_HoneymancyCrown.name: Honeymancy Crown
TFT12_Augment_HoneymancyCrown.description: Gain a Honeymancy emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and a Nunu.

TFT12_Augment_HoneymancyCrest.name: Honeymancy Crest
TFT12_Augment_HoneymancyCrest.description: Gain a Honeymancy emblem and a Nunu.

TFT12_Augment_EldritchCrest.name: Eldritch Crest
TFT12_Augment_EldritchCrest.description: Gain an Eldritch emblem and a Nilah.

TFT12_Augment_EldritchCrown.name: Eldritch Crown
TFT12_Augment_EldritchCrown.description: Gain an Eldritch emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Nilah.

TFT12_Augment_FaerieCrest.name: Faerie Crest
TFT12_Augment_FaerieCrest.description: Gain a Faerie emblem and a Tristana.

TFT12_Augment_FaerieCrown.name: Faerie Crown
TFT12_Augment_FaerieCrown.description: Gain a Faerie emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Tristana.

TFT12_Augment_SugarcraftCrest.name: Sugarcraft Crest
TFT12_Augment_SugarcraftCrest.description: Gain a Sugarcraft emblem and a Rumble.

TFT12_Augment_SugarcraftCrown.name: Sugarcraft Crown
TFT12_Augment_SugarcraftCrown.description: Gain a Sugarcraft Emblem, a Redemption, and a Rumble.

TFT12_Augment_PortalCrest.name: Portal Crest
TFT12_Augment_PortalCrest.description: Gain a Portal emblem and a Kassadin.

TFT12_Augment_PortalCrown.name: Portal Crown
TFT12_Augment_PortalCrown.description: Gain a Portal emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Kassadin.

TFT12_Augment_PyroCrest.name: Pyro Crest
TFT12_Augment_PyroCrest.description: Gain a Pyro emblem and an Akali.

TFT12_Augment_PyroCrown.name: Pyro Crown
TFT12_Augment_PyroCrown.description: Gain a Pyro emblem, a Infinity Edge, and an Akali.

TFT12_Augment_ChronoCrest.name: Chrono Crest
TFT12_Augment_ChronoCrest.description: Gain a Chrono emblem and a Zilean.

TFT12_Augment_ChronoCrown.name: Chrono Crown
TFT12_Augment_ChronoCrown.description: Gain a Chrono emblem, an Archangel's Staff, and a Zilean.

TFT12_Augment_FrostCrest.name: Frost Crest
TFT12_Augment_FrostCrest.description: Gain a Frost emblem and a Zilean.

TFT12_Augment_FrostCrown.name: Frost Crown
TFT12_Augment_FrostCrown.description: Gain a Frost Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Swain.

TFT12_Augment_WitchcraftCrest.name: Witchcraft Crest
TFT12_Augment_WitchcraftCrest.description: Gain a Witchcraft emblem and a Cassiopeia.

TFT12_Augment_WitchcraftCrown.name: Witchcraft Crown
TFT12_Augment_WitchcraftCrown.description: Gain a Witchcraft emblem, a Hextech Gunblade, and a Cassiopeia.

TFT12_Augment_BlasterCrest.name: Blaster Crest
TFT12_Augment_BlasterCrest.description: Gain an Blaster emblem and a Tristana.

TFT12_Augment_BlasterCrown.name: Blaster Crown
TFT12_Augment_BlasterCrown.description: Gain an Blaster emblem, a Spear Of Shojin, and a Tristana.

TFT12_Augment_BastionCrest.name: Bastion Crest
TFT12_Augment_BastionCrest.description: Gain a Bastion emblem and a Nunu.

TFT12_Augment_BastionCrown.name: Bastion Crown
TFT12_Augment_BastionCrown.description: Gain a Bastion emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and a Nunu.

TFT12_Augment_ScholarCrest.name: Scholar Crest
TFT12_Augment_ScholarCrest.description: Gain a Scholar emblem and an Ahri.

TFT12_Augment_ScholarCrown.name: Scholar Crown
TFT12_Augment_ScholarCrown.description: Gain a Scholar emblem, a Guardbreaker, and an Ahri.

TFT12_Augment_IncantorCrest.name: Incantor Crest
TFT12_Augment_IncantorCrest.description: Gain an Incantor emblem and a Syndra.

TFT12_Augment_IncantorCrown.name: Incantor Crown
TFT12_Augment_IncantorCrown.description: Gain an Incantor emblem a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Syndra.

TFT12_Augment_PreserverCrest.name: Preserver Crest
TFT12_Augment_PreserverCrest.description: Gain a Preserver emblem and a Zilean.

TFT12_Augment_PreserverCrown.name: Preserver Crown
TFT12_Augment_PreserverCrown.description: Gain a Preserver emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Bard.

TFT12_Augment_ShapeshifterCrest.name: Shapeshifter Crest
TFT12_Augment_ShapeshifterCrest.description: Gain a Shapeshifter emblem and a Shyvana.

TFT12_Augment_ShapeshifterCrown.name: Shapeshifter Crown
TFT12_Augment_ShapeshifterCrown.description: Gain a Shapeshifter emblem, a Redemption, and a Shyvana.

TFT12_Augment_HunterCrest.name: Hunter Crest
TFT12_Augment_HunterCrest.description: Gain a Hunter emblem and a Kog'Maw.

TFT12_Augment_HunterCrown.name: Hunter Crown
TFT12_Augment_HunterCrown.description: Gain a Hunter emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and a Kog'Maw.

TFT12_Augment_WarriorCrest.name: Warrior Crest
TFT12_Augment_WarriorCrest.description: Gain a Warrior emblem and an Akali.

TFT12_Augment_WarriorCrown.name: Warrior Crown
TFT12_Augment_WarriorCrown.description: Gain a Warrior emblem, a Hand of Justice, and an Akali.

TFT12_Augment_VanguardCrest.name: Vanguard Crest
TFT12_Augment_VanguardCrest.description: Gain a Vanguard emblem and a Rumble.

TFT12_Augment_VanguardCrown.name: Vanguard Crown
TFT12_Augment_VanguardCrown.description: Gain a Vanguard emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Rumble.

TFT12_Augment_MultistrikerCrest.name: Multistriker Crest
TFT12_Augment_MultistrikerCrest.description: Gain a Multistriker emblem and a Kassadin.

TFT12_Augment_MultistrikerCrown.name: Multistriker Crown
TFT12_Augment_MultistrikerCrown.description: Gain a Multistriker emblem, a Quicksilver, and a Kassadin.

TFT12_Augment_GalioCarry.name: Deja Vu
TFT12_Augment_GalioCarry.description: Gain a Galio. Your strongest Galio has +3 range and gains 15 Mana and 6 Ability Power on each attack. His Ability deals 125% more damage, but no longer stuns or reduces damage.

TFT12_Augment_EliseCarry.name: Spider Queen
TFT12_Augment_EliseCarry.description: Gain a 2-star Elise. Your strongest Elise's Ability no longer Stuns, but poisons her target and the 2 closest enemies with 130% damage over 3 seconds.

TFT12_Augment_BlitzcrankCarry.name: Zap Attack
TFT12_Augment_BlitzcrankCarry.description: Gain a 2-star Blitzcrank. Your strongest Blitzcrank becomes supercharged, dealing magic damage to 2 nearby enemies every 4 seconds and on every Ability cast.

TFT12_Augment_NunuCarry.name: Sweet Tooth
TFT12_Augment_NunuCarry.description: Gain a Nunu. Your strongest Nunu gains 200 Health, 1% Damage Amp per 100 Health, and his heal scales with Health. Whenever his Ability kills an enemy, Nunu permanently gains 35 Health.

TFT12_Augment_NunuCarryPlus.name: Sweet Tooth+
TFT12_Augment_NunuCarryPlus.description: Gain a Nunu. Your strongest Nunu gains 200 Health, 1% Damage Amp per 100 Health, and his heal scales with Health. Whenever his Ability kills an enemy, Nunu permanently gains 35 Health.

TFT12_Augment_PoppyCarry.name: Witchy Wallop
TFT12_Augment_PoppyCarry.description: Gain a 2-star Poppy. Your strongest Poppy's Ability no longer Shields, but strikes 3 times, dealing 80% of the original damage.

TFT12_Augment_RumbleCarry.name: Molten Caramel
TFT12_Augment_RumbleCarry.description: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble's Ability deals 190% damage and costs 30 less Mana but no longer reduces damage. Rumble also gains 15% Omnivamp.

TFT12_Augment_LilliaCarry.name: High Horsepower
TFT12_Augment_LilliaCarry.description: Gain a 2-star Lillia. Your strongest Lillia gains 100% Attack Speed and moves 150% faster. Her Ability deals 235% bonus damage, but only hits 1 target.

TFT12_Augment_WukongCarry.name: Spin To Win
TFT12_Augment_WukongCarry.description: Gain 2 Wukongs. Your strongest Wukong's Ability scales with Attack Damage instead of resists. After each cast, Wukong gains stacking 20% Attack Damage and 30% Attack Speed.

TFT12_Augment_Bastion.name: Raid Boss
TFT12_Augment_Bastion.description: Combat start: Your strongest Bastion gains 20% Health. When other Bastions die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Poppy and a Nunu.

TFT12_Augment_Vanguard.name: Shields Up
TFT12_Augment_Vanguard.description: Your Vangards have 30% stronger shields. Vanguards become immune to crowd control for 6 seconds whenever they gain a shield. Gain a Rumble and a Blitzcrank.

TFT12_Augment_Preserver.name: Aggressive Preservation
TFT12_Augment_Preserver.description: Your Preservers gain both Mana and Health restoration from the trait. Preservers deal 15% more damage. Gain a Bard and a Zilean.

TFT12_Augment_Hunter.name: Endless Hunt
TFT12_Augment_Hunter.description: Your Hunters gain 11% Attack Damage on every takedown. Gain a Twitch and a Kog'maw.

TFT12_Augment_Dragon.name: Draconic Mastery
TFT12_Augment_Dragon.description: Dragons deal 15% bonus damage to Burned enemies. Enemies that are Burned deal 11% less damage to Dragons. Gain a Nomsy and a Shyvana.

TFT12_Augment_Multistriker.name: Press The Attack
TFT12_Augment_Multistriker.description: Your Multistriker's attacks apply a stack on their target for 5 seconds. Every 3rd stack deals true damage equal to 5% of the target's max Health. Gain a Kassadin and an Ashe.

TFT12_Augment_Pyro.name: Cauterize
TFT12_Augment_Pyro.description: Pyromancers' attacks deal 3 bonus magic damage for every 3 cinder collected. Gain an Akali and a Shen.

TFT12_Augment_Honeymancy.name: Bee-st Friends
TFT12_Augment_Honeymancy.description: Honeymancers gain 1 more Bee. When Bees jump to a new Honeymancer, the Honeymancer gains a 25% max Health Shield. Gain a Blitzcrank and a Kog'Maw.

TFT12_Augment_Mage.name: Practice Partners
TFT12_Augment_Mage.description: Whenever a Mage casts an Ability, they grant 4 Mana to the nearest ally. Gain a Soraka and a Galio.

TFT12_Augment_Chrono.name: Fast Forward
TFT12_Augment_Chrono.description: After casting an Ability, Chronomancers gain 25% Attack Speed and 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Gain a Jax and a Zilean.

TFT12_Augment_Incantor.name: Defensive Arts
TFT12_Augment_Incantor.description: Enemies hit by Incantor Abilities deal 10% less damage for 2 seconds. At max stacks, Incantors gain 10 Mana every 2 seconds. Gain a Ziggs and a Syndra.

TFT12_Augment_Faerie.name: Royal Guard
TFT12_Augment_Faerie.description: Every 3 seconds, all Faeries restore 3% max Health, and the Faerie Queen gains 1% Attack Damage and Ability Power for every other suriving Faerie. Gain a Lillia and a Tristana.

TFT12_Augment_Arcana.name: Arcane Conduit
TFT12_Augment_Arcana.description: The High Arcana gains 15% Attack Speed and 5% Health for each unique Arcana champion fielded. Gain an Ahri and a Hecarim.

TFT12_Augment_Frost.name: Frosty Frontline
TFT12_Augment_Frost.description: The Frost trait also grants 1 placeable Frost Statue equipped with Eternal Winter that gains health with each Frost trait level. The first time it would die, it instead heal 40% Health over 7 seconds if an ally is alive. Gain a Warwick and a Zilean.

TFT12_Augment_Sugarcraft.name: Caramelized Comforts
TFT12_Augment_Sugarcraft.description:
Sugarcrafters gain 50 Health and 7% chance to drop 1 gold on kill for each component they hold. Gain a Soraka and a Rumble.

Artifact, Support, and Radiant items count as 2 components.

TFT12_Augment_Witch.name: Potions 201
TFT12_Augment_Witch.description: Witch curses last forever. Witch Abilities also curse the nearest uncursed champion. If all champions are cursed, Witches gain 20% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Poppy and a Cassiopeia.

TFT12_Augment_Scholar.name: Higher Education
TFT12_Augment_Scholar.description: Every time your Scholars spend 100 Mana, all Scholars gain 10% Attack Speed. Gain a Zoe and an Ahri.

TFT12_Augment_Shapeshifter.name: Eternal Growth
TFT12_Augment_Shapeshifter.description: Shapeshifters that begin combat next to another Shapeshifter gain 30 permanent Health. Gain an Elise and a Jayce.

TFT12_Augment_ShapeshifterPlus.name: Eternal Growth+
TFT12_Augment_ShapeshifterPlus.description: Shapeshifters that begin combat next to another Shapeshifter gain 30 permanent Health. Shapeshifters gain 100 Health now. Gain an Elise and a Jayce.

TFT12_Augment_Eldritch.name: School Mascot
TFT12_Augment_Eldritch.description: The Eldritch summon is holding beneficial items. The summon gains bonus 5% Health and 10 Ability Power. Gain an Elise and a Syndra.

TFT_Augment_GoldenQuest.name: A Golden Quest
TFT_Augment_GoldenQuest.description: The first time you have 161 or more gold, gain a 2-star 5-cost champion and 3 items tailored to them.

TFT12_Augment_GalioCarryPlus.name: Deja Vu+
TFT12_Augment_GalioCarryPlus.description: Gain a 2-star Galio. Your strongest Galio gain +3 Range and gains 15 Mana and 6 Ability Power on each attack. His spell deals 125% increased damage but no longer stuns or reduces damage.

TFT12_Augment_RumbleCarryPlus.name: Molten Caramel+
TFT12_Augment_RumbleCarryPlus.description: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble's Ability deals 190% damage and costs 30 less Mana but no longer reduces damage. Rumble also gains 15% Omnivamp.

TFT12_Augment_Transfiguration.name: Transfiguration
TFT12_Augment_Transfiguration.description:
Gain a random component. For every 3 Charms you purchase this game, gain another component (max +4).
(Charms: ?)
